Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid (a respiratory sensitiser and cause of dermatitis) used on the Mazak QT-10 CNC machine (serial number 147120833), is prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that workers liable to be exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid (a respiratory sensitiser and cause of dermatitis) and stainless steel welding fume (a respiratory sensitiser) are under suitable health surveillance.
